author: jrupp76
title: Counteract other bad review
review: I have three young boys ranging from 6-10 who are all Ninjago fans. We own two of these bikes. It has a moveable tail (no problems with it falling off on either one), two missles, and a moving front snake head. The boys play with the sets all the time, and seem to love them

author: StevenTheBrick
title: Lashaâ€™s Bite Cycle
review:
3/5

 

I got this from my Cousin already built, but the building experience looked meh when you look at the inside.

 

The playability and price of this is great for a Ninjago set. The vehicle looks awesome. Parts aren't that interesting, but you get Cole and Lasha. Another figure could've helped this set out more.
